Articles.Content:
Kerbal Board Games, the future of the Spacecraft Exchange!

.....nah, just joking. Anyways, here is a 100 percent stock Monopoly board, comes with dice.

Dice is operated by firing the aerospike, then rapidly turning it randomly to make sure not the same side comes down every time.

[DOWNLOAD](https://www.dropbox.com/s/gnqi8nnvxoo3tyl/Monopoly.craft?dl=0)

Anyways, pics!

[![screenshot181_zpsii75veih.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot181_zpsii75veih.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/screenshot181_zpsii75veih.png.html)

[![screenshot428_zpsohuujiho.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot428_zpsohuujiho.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/screenshot428_zpsohuujiho.png.html)

[![screenshot431_zpslifz8mgg.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot431_zpslifz8mgg.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/screenshot431_zpslifz8mgg.png.html)

[![screenshot166_zpsyu25djqk.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot166_zpsyu25djqk.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/screenshot166_zpsyu25djqk.png.html)

[![screenshot423_zpsblco1fz0.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot423_zpsblco1fz0.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/screenshot423_zpsblco1fz0.png.html)
Wow, that's all I can say haha. This is about the most unique thing I've seen in a while! Good job man!

Now, you need to come up with a way to add & remove houses and hotels ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) either with a claw based skycrane or by your houses and hotels having their own engines ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

> 
> Now, you need to come up with a way to add & remove houses and hotels ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) either with a claw based skycrane or by your houses and hotels having their own engines ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Hm...I see.

Wow. This thing is.. amazing. 

Repped!

(PS: How many parts is it?)

Pretty original, to say the least!

Rune. Kerbal *Whatever* Program.
what the heck inspired this ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) , good job on it regardless. Definitely original

> 
> what the heck inspired this ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) , good job on it regardless. Definitely original

There was a giant Monopoly board on display somewhere close to my house, I saw it an thought "MUST KERBALIZE".

Very creative. 

If you use lights of different colours illuminating small signs at each board square, you could recreate the street colour sets properly.

I must spread the rep around before I give it to you again, but I plan on repping you ASAP.

P.S.

Stop coming up with good ideas so I don't use up all my rep on you:D

I bet Jeb wants to be the car. \*rolls eyes\*

> 
> There was a giant Monopoly board on display somewhere close to my house, I saw it an thought "MUST KERBALIZE".

Haha, every where you go and everything you see you probably think, "Can I make that in KSP?"

How are we supposed to play Kerbal Monopoly without a set of pretend paper money to use? Think, man, think!

Just kidding, that would add several zeros to the part count. This is still a magnificent craft, it makes me wish my computer were not broken so I could try it for myself.

> 
> Kerbal *Whatever* Program.

Can we make that a thing?
